title: Kansas City Chiefs Says They're Moving to Kansas
description: The Kansas City Chiefs announced that they are moving across the Missouri border to Kansas after lawmakers there approved a public financing package to build a new stadium. Bloomberg's Municipal Bond Reporter Maxwell Adler discussed the story on "Bloomberg Markets" with Scarlet Fu. (Source: Bloomberg)
